cards.title: Who I am
cards.short_description: I am Sylvain Tosoni, game programmer. Freshly graduated from Bellecour Ecole. Focused on gameplay programming and still learning engine programming.

cards.title: Echoes of Seasons
cards.short_description: A Puzzle game made using Unreal Engine, final project at Bellecour Ecole.

cards.title: Bellum
cards.short_description: Second year project at Bellecour Ecole, using Unity, Free to Play mobile game (no transaction, only demonstration).

cards.title: Rust
cards.short_description: My main language for tooling, mostly using Tauri 2.0.
